description: 'Musk fictions' (4/6). The American novelist, known for his prolific body of work centered on determinism and evolution, holds a prominent place in the personal pantheon of the SpaceX founder.

Extreme heat is causing more drownings in France
description: The number of drownings at the start of summer 2025 was twice as high as during the same period the previous year. This increase is linked to the early onset of heatwaves, which have driven people to swim in rivers and lakes that are minimally or not at all supervised.

headline: Algeria pushes back against Macron's tough line in diplomatic standoff
description: After a letter Emmanuel Macron sent to the prime minister, calling for 'more firmness' on matters of 'migration and security with Algeria,' was published, Algeria claimed Paris laid 'all the blame on the Algerian side.'

headline: Huge wildfire in southern France now under control
description: Authorities said that the most severe fire in France's Mediterranean region in at least 50 years has been contained, though 'There is still a lot of work to be done.' The fire killed one person and destroyed thousands of hectares of land.

headline: How Lake Chad became neglected by international aid
description: 'Lake Chad's Troubled Waters' (3/4). After a surge of solidarity in response to the attacks by Boko Haram, global attention has shifted away from the region. As NGOs have been weakened by the halt in US funding, the humanitarian situation remains dire.

description: In the Corbières hills, 16,000 hectares went up in flames in just 24 hours, despite 2,500 firefighters and the mobilization of nearly all of France's aerial resources.

headline: Mojgan Habibi, chef: 'Before, I was afraid of everything. Now, I have found my freedom'
description: 'Refuge Recipes' (4/6). Iranian native Mojgan Habibi is the breakfast chef at Hôtel du Couvent in Nice. Khoresht mast, a dish reserved for special occasions and made with yogurt, spices, honey and meat, brings back memories of her happy youth in Isfahan before her marriage, when she was free to create and sing.

headline: Sydney Sweeney's American Eagle ad sparks controversy online and pleases Donald Trump
description: With a slogan playing on the ambiguity between 'genes' and 'jeans' − 'Sydney Sweeney has great jeans' − the actress has sparked controversy. Some have accused her of promoting eugenics, while President Donald Trump has come to American Eagle's defense, triggering a surge in its stock price.
